snippet.title: GRID Legends | WORLD-FIRST Gameplay & More Revealed!
snippet.description:
World-exclusive gameplay, details and insight for GRID Legends are right here. Prepare to be on the edge of your seat!

In this special show, join Chris Smith, Creative Director, along with Chris Groves from the Social & Community team, as they walk you through brand new locations, cars, event types, and more coming to GRID Legends. They also chat about how the game delivers its action-packed brand of motorsport, and explain a brand new feature that gives you complete control over the spectacular action you can experience. 

GRID Legends launches February 25 on PlayStation, Xbox, Steam, and Origin! Pre-order to receive exclusive add-ons, including extra cars. The Deluxe Edition of GRID Legends also launches on February 25, including even more bonus content and four huge post-launch expansions. 

Order now: https://www.ea.com/games/grid/grid-legends/buy
Full details: https://www.ea.com/games/grid/grid-legends/news/launch-date-editions-content

00:01 – Welcome to GRID Legends: Aston Martin Valkyrie + Strada Alpina
03:15 – Electric Boost Racing in London
07:28 – Elimination Racing in Moscow
10:46 – Multi-Class Racing: Big Rigs vs Fun Cup Cars

#GRIDLegends #GRID
